appDescription.message: Use ChatGPT inside Chrome's sidebar with Sidely - a secure, fast ChatGPT sidebar extension using your own account.

refreshButtonTooltip.message: Reload sidebar to show new chats.

noticeCloudflare.message: You need to complete the Cloudflare check. Open __PORTAL__ in a tab, sign in, then return.
noticeCloudflare.description: __PORTAL__ will be replaced with the ChatGPT host name.

noticeUnauthorized.message: You need to sign in to your ChatGPT account. Open __PORTAL__ in a tab, sign in, then return.
noticeUnauthorized.description: __PORTAL__ will be replaced with the ChatGPT host name.

noticeError.message: Session verification failed. Try refreshing the page or sign in at __PORTAL__.
noticeError.description: __PORTAL__ will be replaced with the ChatGPT host name.

headerHomeTooltip.message: Go back to the ChatGPT home screen.

settingsExtensionLanguageHint.message: Choose which language Sidely should display in its UI.

settingsDomainHint.message: Pick which ChatGPT domain Sidely should open.

settingsSizeHint.message: Adjust Sidely's layout for compact or wide side panels.
